visualization_prompt: Generate a stockChart showing AAPL stock price trends using time-series data fetching from a live endpoint
visualization_explanation: This configuration creates a responsive stock chart visualizing Apple's historical closing prices. The time-series dataset contains 4 dimensions: timestamp (temporal), opening price (quantitative), closing price (quantitative), and trading volume (quantitative). Live data from Highcharts' demo endpoint ensures real-world statistical properties like volatility clustering and non-normal distribution. The dark-unica theme enhances contrast for financial data visualization while reducing eye strain. The spline chart type minimizes visual noise compared to OHLC bars, aligning with Tufte's data-ink ratio principles. Range selector buttons implement Cairo's interactive affordances, allowing temporal zooming without cluttering the primary visualization. Font sizing follows hierarchical typography (18px title > 14px axis titles > 12px labels) to guide visual perception.
